item.title: General Resolves
item.description: Be better to family Less empty talk Dedicated to study No more stare at screen in the dark Be a man like mosquito, full of aggressiveness and perseverance! ‘I wish you all enough courage to be yourselves without need for approval or permission from anyone…’ ‘I wish you enough humility to stop thinking you are better than anyone… ‘
